alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; Faulk; Hand; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 5:13AM MST until December 16 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...McPherson, Edmunds, Faulk and Hand Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As cold air pushes in, rain and snow will change over to all snow. The cold air will freeze the wet surfaces and could create icy conditions. Therefore, the combination of ice, snow, and wind could create difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
